name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 25, the black-clad men who blocked the gate of Jianghuai College of Anhui University and prevented students from leaving during the protest appeared in a propaganda video of the Hefei police.
The unidentified people who blocked the school gate were confirmed to be Hefei police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 26, Wang Tianyi, the "number one" Chinese chess player, was taken away by Hangzhou police for investigation on suspicion of bribery by non-state employees.
The article said that the real-name report by chess master Liu Dahua, which was exposed in October last year, was one of the "triggers" of this case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 26, there were rumors in the industry that "some public funds have requested that salaries paid in excess of 2.9 million yuan in 2023 be returned." 
A reporter verified that at present, some public funds under central enterprises have indeed implemented salary restrictions, and the reimbursement of salaries exceeding the standard since 2022 has started this week, but the reimbursement standard is not the above 2.9 million yuan, but a partial reimbursement after reaching a certain standard.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 26, Tibet. A blogger said that he was selling milk tea at a stall by the lake, and a group of tourists came and sat on the chairs he placed without permission. He went forward to argue, but was beaten and choked by the leader. The video shows that the blogger's eyes are red and there are multiple scars on his mouth and neck.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 27, the female anchor of Zhong Xuegao's live broadcast room suddenly fainted during the live broadcast.
The live broadcast room then replaced the anchor and said that the fainted anchor had gone to rest and would go to the hospital later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 27, at Tangde Garden in Tianhe District, Guangzhou, an urban management officer got into an argument with a coconut vendor, who then hit the officer on the head with a shovel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/5EaGAjT4uO

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"High-risk occupation"
On June 27, the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee reviewed and approved that two former defense ministers, Li Shangfu and Wei Fenghe, were charged with taking bribes, seeking benefits for others, violating political and organizational discipline, etc., and were handed over to the military procuratorate for prosecution and expelled from the CPC.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 27, a blogger published a "kill list of traitors" and Hu Xijin, Zhang Wenhong and others were on the list.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 27 (Release) Shaanxi. Wu Yongqiang, a police officer of the Shaanxi Public Security Department, came to Beijing to petition and reported corruption issues such as Shaanxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and Secretary Wang Xingning, and Shaanxi Provincial Anti-gang Office Director and Executive Deputy Director of the Public Security Department Yang Shangwei. Wu Yongqiang said that he started reporting this year, but the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection has not accepted it. On May 8, after reporting to the State Bureau of Letters and Calls, until June 25, the Shanxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection refused to investigate and verify.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Water situation in Xiaoyi, Shanxi Province, on June 26. According to local residents, it rained around 5 pm, and turned into this an hour later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 26 (Released) Chengdu, Sichuan. Poly Xihui Smart Cloud City Community was exposed to be building a sewage treatment plant nearby, and the owners knelt down to protest to the leaders. It is reported that as early as a week ago, the owners spontaneously guarded the construction site to prevent the construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Chuzhou, Anhui, a netizen was punished by the traffic police for violating traffic rules while riding a bicycle. During the period, he was warned by the traffic police for taking photos with his mobile phone, "Don't order me around." The traffic police who issued the ticket then wanted to take the netizen away on the grounds of suspected obstruction of law enforcement.
On June 27, the netizen posted a video in response to the doubts, saying that citizens have the right to supervise law enforcement. In addition, he also revealed that the traffic police who enforced the law were auxiliary police, and the police number was not his.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 26, Zhaoqing, Guangdong. The owner of the unfinished Country Garden project in Sihui District jumped off a building to defend his rights, and a large number of onlookers gathered downstairs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guilin, Guangxi, citizens angrily denounced the staff who posed for photos to clean up the streets after the disaster, "We support the Communist Party, what have you done? You are all pretending here, everyone is promoting, they are all liars."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 27, parents reported that Shandong Liangshan County Experimental Senior High School charged high school freshmen 790 yuan for school uniforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was reported on June 24 that Far Eastern Group CEO Jiang Xipei mentioned in a speech at the "2024 Zhenghe Island Case Study Annual Meeting" that "No matter how outstanding you are, if you don't want to get married or only want to have one or two children after marriage, Far East will not recruit you. For employees who give birth to three children, the company will reward 210,000 yuan." This statement caused ridicule from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 26, in Jiuzhi Town, Luzhou, Sichuan, workers were installing guardrails on a bridge. Netizens responded: It is urgent to set up an anti-jumping bureau.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A Beijing worker shows the actual purchasing power of his hourly wage of 20.6 yuan (2.83 U.S. dollars) in Tiantongyuan and Majuqiao.
In 2023, Beijing will raise the minimum wage standard to no less than 13.91 yuan per hour.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 27, Changchun, Jilin. A building under repair on Renmin Street collapsed, and the scaffolding fell to the ground. Firefighters were dealing with the situation on the scene. Some netizens said in the comment area that they received a call from the police asking them to delete the video because they posted a video about the incident online.
Official report: The accident caused 5 injuries, and 1 person is being searched and rescued.
